system.description:
The darkness in your blood grows in intensity. You gain the following benefits:

  • The range of your darkvision increases by 30 feet.
  • Your darkvision can penetrate magical darkness.
  • Half your rogue levels count as bloodblade levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.BbgsRNQeqRZeGWfE]{Extra Attack} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e-bloody-heretics.bloody-heretics.Item.Rw64mkIKwTispsrX]{Sanguine Reach} features.
  • Half your bloodblade levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.e5mepl86zsavxhrp]{Self-Preservation} feature.
  • When you are below your maximum hit points, you are lightly obscured. If you are bloodied, the light level around you drops by one step, from bright light to dim light, from dim light to darkness, and from darkness to magical darkness.
  • As long as you are in an area of dim light or darker, one-half of your bloodblade levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of determining your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} damage.
